documenttitle.text: Red Hat Security Advisory: dotnet security and bugfix update

note.text:
An update for .NET Core 2.1 is now available for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8.

Red Hat Product Security has rated this update as having a security impact of Important. A Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) base score, which gives a detailed severity rating, is available for each vulnerability from the CVE link(s) in the References section.
note.title: Topic

note.text:
.NET Core is a managed-software framework. It implements a subset of the .NET
framework APIs and several new APIs, and it includes a CLR implementation.

New versions of .NET Core that address a security vulnerability are now available. The updated versions are .NET Core SDK 2.1.521 and .NET Core Runtime 2.1.25.

Security Fix(es):

* dotnet: certificate chain building recursion Denial of Service (CVE-2021-1721)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.
